FIELD.NAME: HEADER-VERSION
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Version Number for this message description.

FIELD.NAME: MESSAGE-TYPE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Message type identifier: REQ, RESP, or MSG

FIELD.NAME: MESSAGE-SUBTYPE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Unique message identifier, fixed for GMSEC Standard Messages

FIELD.NAME: CONTENT-VERSION
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Version Number for this message content description

FIELD.NAME: MSG-ID
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Unique ID set by the originator of this message. Can be a sequence number. Aids in synchronizing responses.

FIELD.NAME: USER
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Which user/workposition/proc/schedule the message is coming from

FIELD.NAME: SERVICE-NAME
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Name of the service offered by a component.

FIELD.NAME: OPERATION-NAME
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Name of the operation within the specified service.

FIELD.NAME: OPERATION-NUMBER
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Number of the operation within the specified service.

FIELD.NAME: OPERATION-VERSION
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Version of the operation within the specified service.

FIELD.NAME: NUM-OF-PARAMS
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Number of parameters included in the service request

FIELD.NAME: PARAM.1.VALUE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Value of the parameter Component must ascertain the data type before accessing the value (e.g. with a function call). Of type 'Variable' in the GMSEC ISD.

FIELD.NAME: PRIORITY
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Indicates processing priority, if applicable (1: Nominal, 2: Medium, 3: High)

FIELD.NAME: RESPONSE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Indicates if a response is required. Defaults to No.

FIELD.NAME: REQUESTED-EXECUTION-TIME
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Absolute or relative time can apply.

FIELD.NAME: REQUESTED-EXPIRATION-TIME
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Absolute or relative time can apply.
